name: Cheeseshot
description:
CheeseShot A game for Gameoff 2020

This is my first game jam, my first project with Godot, and my first ever game.

Designing a game was great fun, even if I couldn't reach completion. I just tried to do too much, and even with an entire month at my disposal, it just went over my head.

So, just to be clear: THIS GAME IS BARELY FUNCTIONAL

It's not balanced, and it has bugs. Like, big bugs, preventing you to play a second game without restarting it. But I'm uploading to meet the deadline.

I hope to continue working on it, and I have an idea or two about things I can experiment more with in the future.
